duties_responsibilities.duty: Greet visitors and provide guided access to units with impeccable manners and discretion.
Handle package deliveries and monitor security cameras for building premises.
Coordinate all deliveries and control access of guests/vendors to residential floors.
Collaborate with building staff to ensure residents' needs are met and maintain a secure environment.
Review daily front desk procedures, maintain a professional and clean environment, and handle crisis situations effectively.
Answer the telephone, communicate clearly and professionally, and perform other assigned duties by management.

education_certification.credential: High school graduate or equivalent vocational training certificate. Some college or training in the Hospitality Industry is desirable.
